 void EventIconRenderer.renderIcons(Canvas canvas, TimelineRenderingContext renderingContext)
          Renders the events visible in the current frame onto the Canvas of the TimelineView.
The TimelineRenderingContext provides the index of the first and last visible Events through the getFirtEventIndex() and getTimeline() methods.Then they can be extracted from getTimeline() -> TimelineView.getEvents() -> Events.getEvents()
The the horizontal positioning of the events can be found in getEventsX().
